title: Online Project-Based Mathematics Practice (EBP) Educational Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic arithmetic operations and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Real-life connected projects using digital devices, with enhanced collaboration and feedback among learners.

learning_goals: Learners collect and analyze statistical evidence to apply mathematical models for real-world problem-solving.
Learners systematically design and implement project deliverables using digital tools.
Learners revise and optimize project outputs based on peer assessment and expert feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
